name: Black Dawn
description:
Black Dawn is a sci-fi dungeon crawler for the Amiga, combining the gameplay style of Dungeon Master with the environmental style of Alien Breed. Developed and released by Andrew Campbell, it is the original title in the Black Dawn series of games for the Amiga.

In this game, you must pass through three decks of an alien-infested spaceship, eliminating the hostile creatures you encounter along the way. Resources are scarce, though, requiring you to properly manage your weapons and equipment. Occasional dispensers allow you to acquire other weapons and ammunition, but only if you can afford it.
